title: Enormous ping spike/jitter while playing.
body:
It just started today, at first I thought it was my internet, but after running countless tests, I found no avail to what the problem is, it'll spike up to 1000-4000ms out of the complete blue and just stay there for 10-20 seconds, then jump back down to the normal ping, then repeat. I initially thought it was my internet, but every other online game runs smoothly, and my internet ping is what it usually is - except while playing league where it'll spike up, to an unplayable amount.

I lost a ranked game because of this, is anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Note that while you have a good connection to one service or game, it isn't indicative that your connection to all servers is fine. Each service/game you access hosts their servers in a different geolocation, so routing issues may occur to one server while not affecting others. Before we look into your network routing to check for issues, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Please let me know if this resolved the issue.
